div.h2: Covid-19 Closure at Westinghouse Arts Academy

div.p: The Westinghouse Arts Academy building will be physically closed for the foreseeable future. School is being conducted virtually with all arts and academics classes up and running via our learning platform, Canvas. Families, please check your email for more details.
Admissions evaluations will be conducted virtually. For admissions and enrollment information, or questions and comments of any kind:
Call: 412/646-1718 and leave a message with your phone number. We will retrieve voicemail.

Westinghouse Arts Academy Charter School is a public high school located east of Pittsburgh. We’re tuition-free, and open to any student in grades 9-12 who is located in Pennsylvania. Westinghouse Arts Academy is dedicated to achievement in both traditional academics as well as six unique and comprehensive arts programs.

a.class: vc_general vc_btn3 vc_btn3-size-md vc_btn3-shape-rounded vc_btn3-style-outline vc_btn3-color-turquoise
a.title: Our Programs

div.p:
Public Board meeting: Wednesday, May 6 at 6pm
Join Zoom Meeting
https://zoom.us/j/8682224856
Meeting ID: 868 222 4856
For public commentary, please email your request to be added to the agenda 24 hours in advance to CEO Richard Fosbrink, rfosbrink@westinghousearts.org.

Westinghouse Arts Academy Charter School is a public high school located east of Pittsburgh. We’re a tuition-free, and open to any student in grades 9-12 who is located in Pennsylvania. Westinghouse Arts Academy is dedicated to achievement in both traditional academics as well as six unique and comprehensive arts programs.

a.class: vc_general vc_btn3 vc_btn3-size-md vc_btn3-shape-rounded vc_btn3-style-outline vc_btn3-color-turquoise
a.title: Our programs

div.class: splatter wpb_animate_when_almost_visible wpb_fadeIn fadeIn wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-12 vc_hidden-md vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs
wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-6 vc_hidden-md vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs

div.p: Like other schools, our students take core subjects including English, math, science and social studies, belong to a variety of clubs and activities, and graduate on par with peers… ready for college and beyond.

But what’s not typical: our students will take about 30 different arts classes in their area of concentration over four years of high school, progressing to advanced and in-depth coursework as upperclassmen. Though it differs by concentration, we offer unparalleled access to opportunities to perform, display, participate, and delve deeply into art.
The result: our students are engaged and challenged by rigorous arts study while also pursuing high levels of academic achievement.

div.p: Like other schools, our students take core subjects including English, math, science and social studies, belong to a variety of clubs and activities, and graduate on par with peers… ready for college and beyond.

But what’s not typical: our students will take about 30 different arts classes in their area of concentration over four years of high school, progressing to advanced and in-depth coursework as upperclassmen. Though it differs by concentration, we offer unparalleled access to opportunities to perform, display, participate, and delve deeply into art.
The result: our students are engaged and challenged by rigorous arts study while also pursuing high levels of academic achievement.

div.p: Admission to Westinghouse Arts Academy is offered to students who successfully audition for one of our six arts focus areas. If you’re interested in audition and enrollment information, sign up to learn more about the process, schedule a tour or shadow day, and secure an evaluation date to audition. Or, support our programs with a financial gift.

a.title: MORE EVENTS

a.span: Senior Spotlight tonight on Aidan Setlock. Aidan w

img.alt: Senior Spotlight tonight on Aidan Setlock. Aidan will attend IUP in fall, will major in technical theatre. "Did you remember to actor proof it?" @waacs.theatre #waacs #westinghouseartsacademy #seniorspotlight #classof2020

a.span: Cyber Studio Highlight - Another awesome submissio

img.alt: Cyber Studio Highlight - Another awesome submission from Liv S. This ones for mixed media. The use of colors, and the multiple perspectives and orientations of the piece get to the root of this assignment. #waacs #charterschool #artschool #pghart #hsart #mixedmedia

a.span: Cyber Studio Highlight! Jenna C's Sculpture I proj

img.alt: Cyber Studio Highlight! Jenna C's Sculpture I project makes a clear connection to Louise Nevelson. Nevelson is known for her monumental, monochromatic sculptures #waacs #charterschool #artschool #louisenevelson #artschool #pghart #hsartist

a.span: quARanTine challenge: Spring is here and its time

img.alt: quARanTine challenge: Spring is here and its time to bring the flowers inside! Check out work by artist @zoebradleydesign for inspirations then make a paper flower installation of your own! Consider the space your flower(s) will occupy, their form & scale. How do you want your viewer to interact with them? Are they merely pretty or should they bring attention to something? Are they intended to impede movement or invite touch? #waacs #installation #paperart #charterschool #sculpture #pghart #hsart #interaction #zoebradley
